description:
Take your little co-pilot out on some 2-wheeled adventures. This bike seat is easy to mount and easy to adjust, letting you spend more time riding. By attaching securely to your bike’s frame this seat has a natural-feeling weight distribution. And, the seat’s solid steel supports smooth out your passenger’s ride.

  • Quick release bracket locks the seat in place and makes mounting and removal a cinch
  • Padded 5-point adjustable harness for both safety and comfort
  • Magnetic childproof buckle
  • Adjustable foot rests and foot straps grow with your child
  • Water-repellant padding wipes off easily
  • Rear facing reflector help keep you and your passenger seen
  • Designed and tested for children from 9 months to 6 years (consult a pediatrician for children under 1 year), and up to 18kg
name: Thule Yepp Nexxt Maxi Frame Mount - Infants to Children
